Partizanu cilj Evroliga, roster i dalje nije zatvoren
03 Nov 2019, 12:53 by Nemanja
Sportski direktor Košarkaškog kluba Partizan Nikola Lončar istakao je da je cilj kluba u ovoj sezoni da izbore plasman u Evroligu.
Rezultati u Evrokupu zadovoljavaju sve u klubu, od funkcionera, igrača, pa do navijača, s obzirom na to da Partizan ima pet pobeda iz isto toliko utakmica. U ABA ligi je situacija nešto drugačija, pa crno-beli tako imaju tri pobede i dva poraza, ali uprkos svemu, cilj je jasan – Evroliga.
– Apsolutno nam je cilj Evroliga. Ne znam da li je to realno posle ove sezone. Kao što sam rekao, sve će to biti jasnije na proleće. Generalno cilj kluba je da se vratimo u Evroligu, to je težnja svakoga. Sebi smo zacrtali da to pokušamo rezultatima u ovoj sezoni – rekao je Nikola Lončar za ,,Maxbet“ radio.
Tokom nedelje, Partizan je pojačao doskorašnji igrač Budućnosti Džejms Bel, koji bi uskoro trebalo da se stavi na raspolaganje treneru Trinkijeriju.
– Ne znamo još uvek kada će biti na parketu, mora da prođe lekarski pregled prvo, pa ćemo videti kada će se priključiti timu. Još uvek nije stigao u Beograd, ali ne isključujemo mogućnost da debituje protiv Venecije u utorak – kazao je Lončar.
Uprkos dolasku Bela, Lončar je rekao da roster nije zatvoren, jer sport je nepredvidiv.
– Nikada ne možemo da kažemo da je roster zatvoren. Sport je nepredvidiv, uvek može nešto da se desi. Bel nam je potreban, takav igrač. Nikome on neće uzeti minute niti otimati uloge. Za sada smo zadovoljni rosterom – istakao je Lončar.

Partisan goal of Euroleague roster is still not closed
03 Nov 2019, 12:53 by Nemanja
Partizan Basketball Club sports director Nikola Loncar emphasized that the goal of the club this season is to choose a placement in the Euroleague.
The results in Eurocup are satisfying for everyone in the club, from officials, players and fans, since Partizan have five wins from just as many games. In the ABA league, the situation is somewhat different, so the black and whites have three wins and two losses, but despite everything, the goal is clear - the Euroleague.
- We absolutely aim for the Euroleague. I don't know if it's realistic after this season. Like I said, it will all be clearer in the spring. Generally the goal of the club is to return to the Euroleague, this is everyone's aspiration. We set out to try to get results this season - said Nikola Loncar for Maxbet radio.
During the week, Partizan was stepped up by former Future Player James Bell, who should soon be available to coach Trinkieri.
- We do not know yet when he will be on the floor, he has to undergo a medical examination first, so we will see when he will join the team. He has not yet arrived in Belgrade, but we do not rule out the possibility of his debut against Venice on Tuesday - Loncar said.
Despite Bell's arrival, Loncar said the roster was not closed because the sport was unpredictable.
- We can never say the roster is closed. Sport is unpredictable, something can always happen. We need Bel, such a player. He will not take minutes or rob anyone of anyone. So far, we are pleased with the roster - Loncar pointed out.
